title: Members of the Pastor's Aid Committee at Wesley Center AMEZ Church including in back row, Evelyn Hays Poe, unknown, Gloria Golden Grate, Addy Harper, Reverend Charles Foggie, three unknown women, and Wilma Harper on right end; front row including Ruth Satter White, Thelma West, Betty Clark Fowler, Agnes Stokes, and Doris Harper, in front of painted mural in A.
